51253.description: Each batch is made from a special selection of barrel-aged reserve rums and aged for a minimum of eight years, giving it a refined flavor with notes of prune, apricot, nutmeg, and vanilla.
51253.title: Bacardi 8

51286.description: Cruzan Aged Light Rum is a blend of rums aged one to four years in American oak casks—then treated to a ﬁltration process that lightens the color and brings out a full-bodied, smooth taste you’ll love.
51286.title: Cruzan

51303.description: This mahogany-hues, extra-smooth, and full-bodies rum boasts a round entry that leads to a palate of dark caramel and toasted nuts. The finish has a dry, toasted coconut fade.
51303.title: Flor De Cana Gran Res

51350.description: Myers's Rum is produced from continuous and pot still distillation and is then matured for up to four years on white oak barrels.
51350.title: Myers's

51369.description: A very fine blend of Barbados rums, aged for five years in bourbon casks in the Caribbean and then refined in old French oak casks at Château de Bonbonnet. Its succulent nose, typical of the Barbados style, reveals notes of toasted coconut, fudge, and oaky vanilla.
51369.title: Plantation Grande Reserve Rum

51376.description: Sailor Jerry is a straight-up, no-nonsense rum, crafted from a selection of rums distilled in the Caribbean. Master blenders marry the rums to an exacting recipe, then infuse it with one-of-kind mix of spices and other natural flavors, most notably vanilla and a touch of cinnamon. The result is high-quality, old-school spiced rum. An enduring classic, not a fly-by-night fancy.
51376.title: Sailor Jerry

73992.description: The latest from Master Blender Allen Smith, Black Barrel is a small batch, handcrafted blend made of matured double pot distillates and aged column distillates. In a process called finishing, the blended rum is then matured for a second time in deeply charred Bourbon oak barrels. This unique process releases spicy aromas that are at once balanced, and bold.
73992.title: Mount Gay Black Barrel Rum

116012.description: Discover a unique vodka experience when French craftsmanship, superior ingredients, and a distinct distilling process merge to create a smooth taste that brings people together for moments of excellence.
116012.title: Grey Goose

116013.description: After a sip of Ketel One Vodka, you'll taste a crisp, unmistakable coolness.
116013.title: Ketel One

116015.description: Stoli Ohranj has a light and floral aroma of orange zest and essential oils, the more top scents of orange blossom balanced by richer elements of orange liqueur and marmalade. Stoli Ohranj has orange cream on its palate, hints of dark chocolate and more varied flavors of tangerine, mandarin and kumquat, and a lingering fresh zesty note of lemon.
116015.title: Stolichnaya Ohranj

116016.description: Stolichnaya Premium Vodka is a classically-styled, exceptionally smooth vodka. Crystal clear in color with marshmallow, mineral, and mild fruit peel aromas. A soft, supple entry leads to a smooth, medium bodied palate with pastry frosting, talc, and citrus rind flavors. Finishes with a clean, lightly sweet, sugar dust, wet straw, and balanced pepper fade.
116016.title: Stolichnaya

116017.description: Tito’s Handmade Vodka is a corn-based vodka produced in Austin at Texas’ oldest legal distillery. They make it in batches, use old-fashioned pot stills, and taste-test every batch. Tito’s Handmade Vodka is designed to be savored by spirit connoisseurs and everyday drinkers alike. Their process, similar to those used to make fine single malt scotches and high-end French cognacs, requires more skill and effort than others, but it's well worth it. Naturally gluten-free.
116017.title: Tito's Handmade Vodka

116029.description: Belvedere, the world's first luxury vodka, is authentic and natural, handcrafted the way Polish vodka has been made for over 600 years.
116029.title: Belvedere

116092.description: Smirnoff is the world's No. 1 vodka. Its classic taste has inspired other varieties throughout all four corners of the globe.
116092.title: Smirnoff

116093.description: Absolut is made exclusively from natural ingredients, and unlike other vodkas, it doesn't contain any added sugar. In fact, Absolut is as pure as vodka can be. Rich, full-bodied and complex, yet smooth and mellow with a distinct character of grain, followed by a hint of dried fruit.
116093.title: Absolut

116095.description: Stoli Vanil offers elegant aromas of vanilla pod, crème anglaise, and chocolate, with undertones of toasted buttery grain, but without the heavy cloying sweetness of some vanilla vodkas. Stoli Vanil’s palate brings a creamy sweetness to the fore, but it is light and balanced, with cocoa powder, white pepper, and sweet spicy notes.
116095.title: Stolichnaya Vanil

145692.description: Perfectly balanced, light and luminous with a tonic note, Acqua Panna has the rare ability to enhance even the most delicate flavors.
145692.title: Acqua Panna 750mL

145693.description: Food experts all over the world concur on S.Pellegrino’s distinctive ability to complement the finest of food and wine, thus enhancing the overall dining experience. Authentic and spontaneous, unique in its blend of minerals, S.Pellegrino embodies the intimate essence of the Italian taste.
145693.title: San Pellegrino 750mL

items.description: Creamy chocolate pudding filled inside a rich chocolate cake and topped with a dark fudgy icing.
items.title: Brooklyn Blackout Cake

items.description: All kobe beef fried dog “Ripper Style” topped with onion rings, and BBQ Sauce. Served with a side of fries.
items.title: Angels Halo Dog

items.description: We take iceberg lettuce and top it with sliced red onions, chives, cherry tomatoes, Maytag bleu cheese, housemade bacon lardons, and a red wine vinaigrette. It is finished in a Maytag blue cheese dressing.
items.title: Wedge Salad

items.description: We muddle fresh mint with Flor De Cana Gran Res rum and lime juice. A quick shake, then it's served tall with a fresh mint sprig.
items.title: Mojito

modifierItems.description: This mahogany-hues, extra-smooth, and full-bodies rum boasts a round entry that leads to a palate of dark caramel and toasted nuts. The finish has a dry, toasted coconut fade.

Master blenders marry the rums to an exacting recipe, then infuse it with one-of-kind mix of spices and other natural flavors, most notably vanilla and a touch of cinnamon. The result is high-quality, old-school spiced rum. An enduring classic, not a fly-by-night fancy.
modifierItems.title: Sailor Jerry

items.description: Brooklyn Lager is amber-gold in color and displays a firm malt center supported by a refreshing bitterness and floral hop aroma. Caramel malts show in the finish. The aromatic qualities of the beer are enhanced by dry-hopping, the centuries-old practice of steeping the beer with fresh hops as it undergoes a long, cold maturation. The result is a wonderfully flavorful beer, smooth, refreshing and very versatile with food. Brooklyn, NY 5.2% ABV
items.title: Brooklyn Lager Draft

modifierGroups.title: Would you like this as a pitcher?
Would you like a 25 oz. Brooklyn?

items.description: Our chefs start with a crispy, herb-breaded chicken breast, top it with fresh mozzarella and provolone cheese, and finish with a housemade pomodoro sauce and basil. Served on a Portuguese roll with a side of golden French fries.
items.title: Chicken Parmesan Sandwich

items.description: Brimming with ripe citrus and stone fruit flavors that are framed by sleek and succulent acid architecture on the nose, the palate is a vibrant mix of kaffir lime, lemon zest and nectarine aromatics intermingle with the bright perfume of orange blossom.
items.title: Sauvignon Blanc, Cloudy Bay, Marlborough, New Zealand 2016

items.description: Choose from Acqua Panna mineral water, San Pellegrino sparkling water, or ice water.
items.title: Choice of Water

items.description: Hennessy V.S. is a blend of around 40 different "eaux-de-vie" selected for their vivacity from the best growing areas of the Cognac region.
items.title: Hennessy V.S.

items.description: The classic brunch cocktail made to your liking. We start with a base of Ketel One vodka, fresh tomato juice, horseradish, and Worcestershire sauce. Customize your Bloody Mary by choosing the spice level and garnish.

warnings.allergyWarningBody: Menu items contain common food allergens such as those found in peanuts, tree nuts, fish, shellfish, eggs, milk, wheat and soy. Our facilities are NOT allergen free environments.
warnings.rawFoodProductBody: Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of food borne illnesses.
warnings.alcoholWarningBody: Customers must be 21 years of age or older to order and/ or drink alcoholic beverages.

modifierItems.description: The latest from Master Blender Allen Smith, Black Barrel is a small batch, handcrafted blend made of matured double pot distillates and aged column distillates. In a process called finishing, the blended rum is then matured for a second time in deeply charred Bourbon oak barrels. This unique process releases spicy aromas that are at once balanced, and bold.
modifierItems.title: Mount Gay Black Barrel Rum

modifierItems.description: Each batch is made from a special selection of barrel-aged reserve rums and aged for a minimum of eight years, giving it a refined flavor with notes of prune, apricot, nutmeg, and vanilla.
modifierItems.title: Bacardi 8

modifierItems.description: Cruzan Aged Light Rum is a blend of rums aged one to four years in American oak casks—then treated to a ﬁltration process that lightens the color and brings out a full-bodied, smooth taste you’ll love.
modifierItems.title: Cruzan

modifierItems.description: Myers's Rum is produced from continuous and pot still distillation and is then matured for up to four years on white oak barrels.
modifierItems.title: Myers's

modifierItems.description: A very fine blend of Barbados rums, aged for five years in bourbon casks in the Caribbean and then refined in old French oak casks at Château de Bonbonnet. Its succulent nose, typical of the Barbados style, reveals notes of toasted coconut, fudge, and oaky vanilla.
modifierItems.title: Plantation Grande Reserve Rum

modifierItems.description: Sailor Jerry is a straight-up, no-nonsense rum, crafted from a selection of rums distilled in the Caribbean. Master blenders marry the rums to an exacting recipe, then infuse it with one-of-kind mix of spices and other natural flavors, most notably vanilla and a touch of cinnamon. The result is high-quality, old-school spiced rum. An enduring classic, not a fly-by-night fancy.
modifierItems.title: Sailor Jerry

119677.description: Hennessy V.S. is a blend of around 40 different "eaux-de-vie" selected for their vivacity from the best growing areas of the Cognac region.
119677.title: Hennessy V.S.

119684.description: Brooklyn Lager is amber-gold in color and displays a firm malt center supported by a refreshing bitterness and floral hop aroma. Caramel malts show in the finish. The aromatic qualities of the beer are enhanced by dry-hopping, the centuries-old practice of steeping the beer with fresh hops as it undergoes a long, cold maturation. The result is a wonderfully flavorful beer, smooth, refreshing and very versatile with food. Brooklyn, NY 5.2% ABV
119684.title: Brooklyn Lager Draft

modifierGroups.title: Would you like this as a pitcher?
Would you like a 25 oz. Brooklyn?

119736.description: Brimming with ripe citrus and stone fruit flavors that are framed by sleek and succulent acid architecture on the nose, the palate is a vibrant mix of kaffir lime, lemon zest and nectarine aromatics intermingle with the bright perfume of orange blossom.
119736.title: Sauvignon Blanc, Cloudy Bay, Marlborough, New Zealand 2016

122589.description: The classic brunch cocktail made to your liking. We start with a base of Ketel One vodka, fresh tomato juice, horseradish, and Worcestershire sauce. Customize your Bloody Mary by choosing the spice level and garnish.
122589.title: Bloody Mary

modifierItems.description: After a sip of Ketel One Vodka, you'll taste a crisp, unmistakable coolness.
modifierItems.title: Ketel One

modifierItems.description: Tito’s Handmade Vodka is a corn-based vodka produced in Austin at Texas’ oldest legal distillery. They make it in batches, use old-fashioned pot stills, and taste-test every batch. Tito’s Handmade Vodka is designed to be savored by spirit connoisseurs and everyday drinkers alike. Their process, similar to those used to make fine single malt scotches and high-end French cognacs, requires more skill and effort than others, but it's well worth it. Naturally gluten-free.
modifierItems.title: Tito's Handmade Vodka

modifierItems.description: Smirnoff is the world's No. 1 vodka. Its classic taste has inspired other varieties throughout all four corners of the globe.
modifierItems.title: Smirnoff

modifierItems.description: Absolut is made exclusively from natural ingredients, and unlike other vodkas, it doesn't contain any added sugar. In fact, Absolut is as pure as vodka can be. Rich, full-bodied and complex, yet smooth and mellow with a distinct character of grain, followed by a hint of dried fruit.
modifierItems.title: Absolut

modifierItems.description: Belvedere, the world's first luxury vodka, is authentic and natural, handcrafted the way Polish vodka has been made for over 600 years.
modifierItems.title: Belvedere

modifierItems.description: Discover a unique vodka experience when French craftsmanship, superior ingredients, and a distinct distilling process merge to create a smooth taste that brings people together for moments of excellence.
modifierItems.title: Grey Goose

modifierItems.description: Stolichnaya Premium Vodka is a classically-styled, exceptionally smooth vodka. Crystal clear in color with marshmallow, mineral, and mild fruit peel aromas. A soft, supple entry leads to a smooth, medium bodied palate with pastry frosting, talc, and citrus rind flavors. Finishes with a clean, lightly sweet, sugar dust, wet straw, and balanced pepper fade.
modifierItems.title: Stolichnaya

modifierItems.description: Stoli Ohranj has a light and floral aroma of orange zest and essential oils, the more top scents of orange blossom balanced by richer elements of orange liqueur and marmalade. Stoli Ohranj has orange cream on its palate, hints of dark chocolate and more varied flavors of tangerine, mandarin and kumquat, and a lingering fresh zesty note of lemon.
modifierItems.title: Stolichnaya Ohranj

modifierItems.description: Stoli Vanil offers elegant aromas of vanilla pod, crème anglaise, and chocolate, with undertones of toasted buttery grain, but without the heavy cloying sweetness of some vanilla vodkas. Stoli Vanil’s palate brings a creamy sweetness to the fore, but it is light and balanced, with cocoa powder, white pepper, and sweet spicy notes.
modifierItems.title: Stolichnaya Vanil

126181.description: Creamy chocolate pudding filled inside a rich chocolate cake and topped with a dark fudgy icing.
126181.title: Brooklyn Blackout Cake

139999.description: Kobe beef dog topped with Harold’s World-Famous Chili, cheese sauce, onions, and scallions. Served with a side of fries.
139999.title: Chili Dog

140000.description: Kobe beef dog topped with cheese sauce, bacon, slaw, and crushed potato chips.  Served with a side of fries.
140000.title: CBGB Dog

140002.description: All kobe beef fried dog “Ripper Style” topped with onion rings, and BBQ Sauce. Served with a side of fries.
140002.title: Angels Halo Dog

140005.description: All beef fried dog, “Ripper Style” with, Russian dressing, swiss cheese, caramelized onion, sauerkraut, and sweet relish.  Served with a side of fries.
140005.title: Deli Dog
